Title: Potentiating the activity of berberine for Staphylococcus aureus in a combinatorial treatment with thymol
Description: In the current study, RNA sequencing based transcriptional profiling was used to elaborate the combinatorial effect of berberine, a well-known antibacterial alkaloid, and thymol, a monoterpenic phenol, on the Staphylococcus aureus transcriptome.
